name: Wizarding Mystery
description:
Go Idle and AFK in Wizarding World!
Raid the Dungeons and get abundant rewards!

The Dark Lord is coming and the whole world is in peril! The Wizarding Academy need a hero to save the world! As the protagonist, you are believed to be the chosen one! Listen to the call and raid the dungeons!

[Game features]

- Epic Wizards and Witches
In the world of Wizarding Mystery, you can collect and level up over one hundred legendary wizards and witches. Every hero has unique skills and stunning powers! Form the strongest team of mighty heroes and destroy the darklord now!

- Go Idle and Raid the Dungeons
Your heroes are working for you even when your are offline! No more grinding and no more pay to win! Heroic skills can be automatically released throughout the battle, allowing you to gain rewards by idle battles. Ten minutes a day, you can experience an epic journey of magic.

- Treasure Raid in The Dungeons anytime
Dungeon system with rogue-like elements, Phantom Castle dungeons with abundant rewards are waiting ahead! Play anytime anywhere and never need to complete tasks by grinding, idle games shall be played with ease!

- Challenge the Global Peak Arena
You can build alliances with friends from around the world to challenge Guild Bosses. With an all-new peak arena, all players can assemble hero team for warrior medal in a fair manner.

- Simple yet Sophisticated Strategy
The seemingly simple six-hero team can form countless strategies! Different hero bonds, mutually exclusive alliances, team formation, skill combinations...With a gentle swing of the magic wand, you can get victory and turn back the powers of darkness!
